Za kvadratni meter stanovanja 3000 evrov
02 Nov 2019, 06:00 by Alenka Penjak

Konec leta bo na Seči končana trenutno edina stanovanjska gradnja v piranski občini. Podjetje Marina rezidenca je ob nekdanji železniški progi Parenzana vložilo denar v gradnjo hiš-dvojčkov in stanovanj.



Foto: Alenka Penjak

SEČA > Na štirih parcelah, ki skupaj merijo 2861 kvadratnih metrov, investitor, podjetje Marina rezidenca, ki ga vodita Marko Mulej z Vrhnike in Daniel Viljevac iz Ljubljane, glavni izvajalec družba Tipo in glavni podizvajalec družba Finali gradijo štiri hiše-dvojčke in osem stanovanj, velikih med 75 in 76 kvadratnimi metri.



K stanovanjem sodi tudi zunanja shramba, zelenica in dve parkirni mesti, te dni pa delavci, ki smo jih srečali, končujejo z urejanjem okolice, s pleskarskimi deli in tisoč drugimi malenkostmi, ki jih želijo končati do zadnjega decembrskega dne.



Kvadratni meter novogradnje bo stal od 3100 do 3350 evrov. V ceno je poleg obeh zunanjih parkirnih prostorov, zelenega atrija in zunanje shrambe vključen še 9,5 odstotni davek. Stevo Čimbur iz družbe Zeta, ki se ukvarja s prodajo nepremičnin, je prepričan, da bodo zanimanje za edino piransko novogradnjo, zaradi kakovosti in primerne lege, pokazali tudi domačini.


Stevo Čimbur

Del Seče, kjer novogradnja raste, je zaključena celota, ravno dovolj odmaknjena od ceste, da omogoča mirno bivanje, prednost omenjene lokacije izpostavlja Čimbur. Sicer pa poleg številnih kakovostnih prostorskih rešitev navaja, da so stanovanja in hiše-dvojčki opremljeni tudi s talnim gretjem in toplotno črpalko. Hortikulturna zasaditev še sledi.


Ko bo naselje končano, bo videti tako, kot kaže slika.




Ob glavni cesti mimo Seče pot zavije na levo, kjer se kmalu srečamo s stanovanjsko novogradnjo ljubljanskih investitorjev. Foto: Alenka Penjak

For a square meter of apartment 3000 euros
02 Nov 2019, 06:00 by Alenka Penjak

At the end of the year, currently the only residential construction in the municipality of Piran will be completed in Seca. Marina Residence has invested money to build twin houses and apartments along the former Parenzana Railway.



Photo: Alenka Penjak

SEČA> On four plots measuring 2861 square meters in total, an investor, the Marina Residence company, run by Marko Mulej from Vrhnika and Daniel Viljevac from Ljubljana, the main contractor Tipo and the main subcontractor are building four semi-detached houses and eight apartments, 75 to 76 square meters in size.



The apartments also include an outdoor pantry, lawns and two parking spaces, and these days the workers we meet are finishing up landscaping, painting jobs and a thousand other little things they want to finish by the last of December.



The square meter of the new building will cost from 3,100 to 3,350 euros. The price includes a 9.5 percent tax in addition to both outdoor parking spaces, the green atrium and the outdoor storage. Zeta real estate firm Stevo Cimbur is convinced that the locals will also show interest in the only Piran new construction, due to the quality and suitable location.


Stevo Chimbur

The part of Seca, where the new construction is growing, is a complete unit, just far enough from the road to allow a peaceful stay. In addition to numerous quality space solutions, it states that apartments and semi-detached houses are equipped with underfloor heating and a heat pump. Horticultural planting still follows.


When the settlement is complete, it will look as shown.




Along the main road past Seca, the path turns to the left, where we will soon meet with residential investors from Ljubljana. Photo: Alenka Penjak
